scripts.test:todo: npm run clean:allure && npx cucumber-js --config cucumber.mjs --parallel 3 --tags "@todo"
scripts.test:debug: npm run clean:allure && npx cucumber-js --config cucumber.mjs --tags "@debug"
scripts.test:smoke: npm run clean:allure && npx cucumber-js --config cucumber.mjs --parallel 2 --tags "@smoke"
scripts.test:regression: npm run clean:allure && npx cucumber-js --config cucumber.mjs --parallel 2 --tags "@regression"
scripts.test:webkit: npm run clean:allure && npx cross-env BROWSER=webkit cucumber-js --config cucumber.mjs --parallel 3 --tags "@todo"
